participant_1.background:
I'm happy as a human, even with my asthma.
i have flown out of the country.
I have a side hustle that I do not tell my parents about because they wouldn't approve.
I try to look professional, but I'm not too concerned about my appearance.
I am an adult male who enjoys eating meat and spending time with my family and friends.

participant_2.background:
I spend my free time training and relaxing.
I am more concerned about my physical comfort than my appearance.
i would travel the world if i could.
i like chasing comodo lizards on a private island.
My family is my everything.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
It's going well, thanks! How about yours?
It's going great! I just got back from a trip to Europe.
Oh wow, that sounds amazing! Where did you go?
I went to Italy, France, and Spain.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to go to Europe.
You should go! It's so beautiful and there's so much to see and do.
I know, I know! It's definitely on my bucket list.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to train and relax.
Cool! I like to do those things too. I also like to travel, eat meat, and spend time with my family and friends.
Nice! I like to travel too, but I'm not as adventurous as you are. I'm more of a homebody.
That's okay! There's nothing wrong with being a homebody.
Thanks! I like my family and friends a lot.
That's great! I'm glad you have a good support system.
